trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Palmdale
There were no other sightings in Palmdale on or around January 1st 1997
divs: Sighting DetailsFrom 1997 to 2000 I was sationed at Edwards AFB and had multiple experiences at the base I would like to pass on to someone. Many I cannot explain or understand. I need to remain completely anonymous and do not want to make any formal statement about anything but would like to discuss information with someone. I was assigned to many bases over my 10yrs including Loring AFB, ME Whiteman AFB, MO Edwards AFB, CA With deployments to 13 countries and other short TDY's within the US. I worked as an Aerospace Ground Equipment Technician during these 10yrs.
